name: Imōto
description:
Imoto is a  Stealth Style 2D Platformer . Silhouette character style with simple and colourful scenery. I had a great time making it and hope you have an amazing time playing it.

The game  explores the idea of Speed Run Stealth Gameplay versus Methodical Stealth Gameplay.

Very short game. Please comment if you would like to see more stages.

Feedback Welcome :) 

Thank you.

Special Thanks & Attribution
Trent Naylor
Noman Saeed
